localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Product fit is the Product/Market fit engine for SaaS companies. Measure and track the PMF of your SaaS application in app with your users. See your PMF score over time, identify the benefits and improvements to focus on from your target market users.
blogPost.body: Product fit is the Product/Market fit engine for SaaS companies. Measure and track the PMF of your SaaS application in app with your users. See your PMF score over time, identify the benefits and improvements to focus on from your target market users.
blogPost.title: Product Fit - Measure product/market fit in app with your users.
blogPost.author: Liam

localize.description: 产品适配是SaaS企业的产品/市场适配引擎。衡量和跟踪你的SaaS应用在用户应用中的PMF。查看您的PMF得分随着时间的推移，从您的目标市场用户中确定利益和改进的重点。
localize.tagline: 在应用中衡量产品/市场与用户的契合度。

localize.description: 產品適配是SaaS企業的產品/市場適配引擎。衡量和跟蹤你的SaaS應用在用戶應用中的PMF。查看您的PMF得分隨着時間的推移，從您的目標市場用戶中確定利益和改進的重點。
localize.tagline: 在應用中衡量產品/市場與用戶的契合度。

previous.excerpt: A lil' bot who's meant to be a companion. Pet it & it'll wiggle its tail, ignore it & it'll ask for attention. The bot uses a camera, for facial recognition & can listen/respond to voice via mics. It knows when you're giving it a hug through touch sensors.
previous.title: Nicobo by Panasonic - Your new pet...that farts

localize.description: 一个注定要成为伙伴的小机器人。抚摸它，它就会摇动尾巴，忽视它，它就会要求关注。这款机器人使用摄像头，进行面部识别，并能通过麦克风聆听/回应语音。它通过触摸传感器知道你何时给它一个拥抱。
一個註定要成爲夥伴的小機器人。撫摸它，它就會搖動尾巴，忽視它，它就會要求關注。這款機器人使用攝像頭，進行面部識別，並能通過麥克風聆聽/迴應語音。它通過觸摸傳感器知道你何時給它一個擁抱。

localize.full_text: 比尔-盖茨表示，加密货币是世界可以不需要的一种创新https://t.co/sMK9btiF7U。
比爾-蓋茨表示，加密貨幣是世界可以不需要的一種創新https://t.co/sMK9btiF7U。
